title: Restore base health-check command to lite/ template
description: Copy the archived health-check.md from .archive/examples/development-project/.claude/commands/health-check.md to lite/.claude/commands/health-check.md. Adapt the command for the lite/ template by removing complex features not applicable to the minimal setup (workflow diagram checks, semantic validation for 20+ tasks). Keep core functionality: task JSON schema validation, relationship integrity, ID safety, overview consistency, status rules, difficulty ranges, and basic CLAUDE.md audit.
completion_notes: Created lite/.claude/commands/health-check.md (~140 lines) from archived 257-line version. Removed: semantic validation for 20+ tasks, workflow diagram staleness checks, owner-capability mismatch detection. Kept: task JSON schema validation, relationship integrity, ID safety, overview consistency, status rules, difficulty ranges, CLAUDE.md audit. Also updated lite/CLAUDE.md to include /health-check in commands list.
notes: Lite version is ~55% of original size. Focused on essential validation that all projects need regardless of scale.

assumptions.description: Lite template users don't need semantic validation for 20+ tasks
assumptions.validation_method: Reviewed lite template purpose - minimal task management, unlikely to reach 20+ tasks

decision_rationale: Removed semantic validation features (stale task detection, owner mismatch, workflow diagram staleness) as these are designed for large collaborative projects with 20+ tasks. Lite template is for smaller projects where these features add complexity without value.
